full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Preventive Maintenance and Inspection Service

The Government of Canada, represented by Agriculture & Agri-Food Canada (AAFC), is seeking a contractor to provide preventive maintenance and inspection services for the security system at the Quebec City Research and Development Centre and the Saint-Augustin-de-Desmaures Research Farm.

## Contract Details

* **Contract Number:**dac-01b46-2024-011 (Quebec-RDC)
* **Notice Type:** Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
* **Pre-Identified Supplier:** Interested suppliers are allowed to signal their interest in bidding by submitting a Statement of Capabilities.
* **Closing Date and Time:** March 27, 2024 at 14:00 EST.
* **Contract Term:** April 1, 2024, to March 31, 2029.

## Service Requirements

The successful contractor will be responsible for providing preventive maintenance and inspection services for the security system at the Quebec City Research and Development Centre and the Saint-Augustin-de-Desmaures Research Farm. The services include regular inspections and maintenance to ensure the security system is functioning properly and meets the required standards.

## Requirements and Terms

* **UNSPSC Codes:** Security and protection software (43233200), Security and control equipment (46151600).
* **Procurement Category:** Service (SRV).
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and others (see the attached document for a comprehensive list).
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Worldwide.
* **Regions of Delivery:** Quebec (excluding the National Capital Region).

## How to Participate

Suppliers who feel they have the capabilities to provide the required services are invited to submit a Statement of Capabilities by email to aafc.escprocurement-cseapprovisionnement.aac@agr.gc.ca on or before the closing date and time. The statement must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the advertised requirements.

## Contact Information

For any inquiries or questions related to this contract, please contact:
Jean-François Lemay
Phone: (343) 571-9706
Email: jean-francois.lemay@agr.gc.ca

## Attachments

The tender notice and all relevant documents are available for download on the Canada Buys website: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).
